contest-event.event-date:
April 1, 1973 D Blackpool Contest (B Section)
Blackpool Contest (B Section) 20 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Blackpool Contest blackpool-contest-b-section
Norbreck Hydro Hotel, Blackpool, Lancashire Prizes - 1st £30 and trophy, 2nd £15, 3rd £10. 22nd annual contest. 6 bands competed.
Dec. 24, 2014, 2:13 p.m. Dec. 16, 2016, 11:58 p.m.
1 Lancashire Constabulary Band Frank Hough Rhapsody in Brass
2 Metropolitan Borough of Wigan School Edward Gray The White Company
3 Tyldesley Band Brian Peacock On the Cornish Coast
Unknown Result Brindle Band Richard Evans
Unknown Result British Aerospace (Chadderton) Charles Holt
Unknown Result Radcliffe Brass Band C. A. Randall
